name: artmaker
description: art generator that uses the 2D canvas and shaders

scripts.minify: VERSION=`node -p "require('./package.json').version"` && PREAMBLE="echo '/* artmaker ${VERSION} | (c) 2020, Cole Granof | MIT License */'" && npm run build && eval $PREAMBLE > artmaker.js && eval $PREAMBLE > artmaker.min.js && npx browserify dist/min.js >> artmaker.js && npx terser --compress --mangle -- artmaker.js >> artmaker.min.js

author: Cole Granof
